abstract: Stephen Ross and Matt Higgins founded the International Champions Cup soccer tournament three years ago to capitalize on top soccer clubs' summer tours of the United States; event has grown to include 10 teams and 17 matches.
lead_paragraph: The International Champions Cup was founded three years ago to capitalize on top soccer clubs’ summer tours of the United States, and the event’s organizers are now pushing to add sponsorship and broadcast deals.

headline.main: Stephen Ross Hopes to Turn Soccer Friendlies Into a Moneymaking Juggernaut
headline.print_headline: Hoping to Turn Summer Tuneups Into a Moneymaking Juggernaut

snippet: The International Champions Cup was founded three years ago to capitalize on top soccer clubs’ summer tours of the United States, and the event’s organizers are now pushing to add sponsorship and broadcast deals.
